sequence:
My Sister's Growth Spurt?!

<size=45>Chapter 5: My Sister's Determination</size>

scripts.say: Things finally settled down around the port as the situation began to diffuse. Laughter began to return as everyone's nerves began to relax.
Though I, unfortunately, had to leave Vincennes alone for a while, I hoped to make up the lost time with her...
Huh? Vincennes seems awfully direct today. I should hear her out...
Commander... how do I become a better secretary?
Commander... treats me the same way my sisters do... always letting me do whatever I want, and going along with me...
Um, I do like being taken care of by all of you...
But, I don't think this should go on forever...
Vincennes glowed with a determination I had never seen in her before.
I don't want to be protected and coddled my whole life...
I also want to be of help to my sisters, and to you, Commander!
Recollections of Quincy and Astoria fawning over their sister immediately popped up inside my head.
Commander, you didn't appoint me to be secretary because you wanted to play with me, right?
From the beginning, those like Vincennes and Indianapolis have always been able to find an important role on the front lines, no matter how they were treated back home.
Well, Vincennes, if you become more capable, then perhaps your sisters will change the way they see you.

options.content: "I'll teach you what being a secretary is all about!"
